meanings.definition: The process of preparing a printing press for a new job by adjusting the settings and making any necessary adjustments.
meanings.sent1: The makereadies were meticulously done to ensure the printing press was ready for the new project.
meanings.sent2: The printer gathered all the makereadies needed to set up the press for the upcoming job.
meanings.sent3: The makereadies decided to throw a party inside the printing press while it was being prepared.
meanings.sent4: The makereadies were like the backstage crew, ensuring everything was perfect before the show.
meanings.sent5: The colorful makereadies made the printing press look like a work of art.

meanings.definition: The materials or equipment used in the preparation of a printing press for a new job.
meanings.sent1: The box contained various makereadies needed to set up the printing press.
meanings.sent2: The technician carefully organized the makereadies to streamline the press setup process.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat played with the makereadies, causing a bit of chaos in the printing room.
meanings.sent4: The makereadies were the unsung heroes behind the scenes, ensuring smooth printing operations.
meanings.sent5: The shiny makereadies gleamed under the bright lights of the printing press.
